meanings.definition: A metal or metallic alloy used when melted to join metallic surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The plumber used solder to fix the leaky pipe.
meanings.sent2: I bought some solder to repair my broken necklace.
meanings.sent3: The robot thought the solder was a shiny snack.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like solder, seamlessly connecting everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sun reflected off the solder, creating a dazzling sparkle.

meanings.definition: To join or mend with solder.
meanings.sent1: I will solder the broken wire back together.
meanings.sent2: He learned how to solder metal pieces in his workshop.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to solder the two burnt cookies into one.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was soldered through shared experiences.
meanings.sent5: She carefully soldered the delicate circuit board with precision.
